fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.mode

Interface Mode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGeometryEditMode, AbstractMode, AddPointMode, BrowserMode, CreateInteriorRingMode, CreateLineStringMode, CreatePointMode, CreatePolygonMode, CreateRectangleMode, GeometryEditingMode, LensPaintListener, MoveFeatureMode, MoveMode, MovePointMode, RemovePointMode, SelectionBoxMode, SelectionMode, ZoomBoxMode, ZoomMode

    public interface Mode
extends KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    Interface for all modes.
    Author:
    Julien Perret

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activated()
      Activate the mode.
      JButton getButton() 
      Cursor getCursor() 
      RenderingTypeMode getRenderingType()
      Rendering type currently used for this mode (handle user interaction)

      • Methods inherited from interface KeyListener

        keyPressed, keyReleased, keyTyped

      • Methods inherited from interface MouseListener

        mouseClicked, mouseEntered, mouseExited, mousePressed, mouseReleased

      • Methods inherited from interface MouseMotionListener

        mouseDragged, mouseMoved

      • Methods inherited from interface MouseWheelListener

        mouseWheelMoved

    • Method Detail

      • getButton

        JButton getButton()
        Returns:
        The button triggering the mode.

      • getCursor

        Cursor getCursor()
        Returns:
        The cursor associated with this mode.

      • activated

        void activated()
        Activate the mode. This is a hook in case a mode needs special initialization.

      • getRenderingType

        RenderingTypeMode getRenderingType()
        Rendering type currently used for this mode (handle user interaction)
